definition: second (i.e. number two)/second time/twice/(math.) quadratic (of degree two)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
two-dimensional/the fictional worlds of anime, comics and games

pinyin: Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: second revolution/campaign from 1913 of the provisional revolutionary government (under Sun Yat-sen and the Guomindang) against Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 and the Northern Warlords

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Second Chinese Character Simplification Scheme (second round of simplified Chinese characters, proposed in 1977 and retracted in 1986)/abbr. to 二簡|二简[er4 jian3]
pinyin: Di4 er4 ci4 Han4 zi4 Jian3 hua4 Fang1 an4

sentences.english: Now Russia, for at least the second time, has fired on a Chinese civilian ship.
sentences.chinese: 現在俄羅斯，至少第二次，解僱了在中國民用船。

sentences.english: Toby, to his credit, didn’t need to be told twice.
sentences.chinese: 託比這一點值得讚揚，他不必我說第二次。

sentences.english: He entertains the belief that the second world war is inevitable before 1936.
sentences.chinese: 他相信1936年以前第二次世界大戰是不能避免的。

sentences.english: Peter meets Yang Cheng for the second time.
sentences.chinese: 彼得與楊成第二次見面。

sentences.english: Eg. For the second time in her life she made an indirect answer.
sentences.chinese: 這是她有生以來第二次說話躲躲閃閃。

sentences.english: Japanese-Americans were rounded up and interned during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大戰期間，日本裔美國人遭到集體關押。

sentences.english: He says nothing of it in the Second Epistle .
sentences.chinese: 他說，沒有它的第二次書信。

sentences.english: The church would not sanction his second marriage.
sentences.chinese: 教會不會認可他的第二次婚姻。

sentences.english: You ask her out a second time and she agrees.
sentences.chinese: 你向他提出第二次約會邀請並且她同意了。

sentences.english: This is the second such event I attended during my six months in London.
sentences.chinese: 這是我到任半年以來第二次出席中資機構的喬遷儀式。

sentences.english: Load structure method was used for the lining of the secondary support's long-term safety assessment.
sentences.chinese: 採用荷載結構法對二次襯砌進行了長期安全性評估。

sentences.english: There were no changes in hemo-dynamics, so they were not repaired again.
sentences.chinese: 因不構成血流動力學的改變，未行二次修復。

sentences.english: This function solves a standard quadratic equation .
sentences.chinese: 這個函數求解一個標準的二次方程。

sentences.english: This year Tianjin hosts the Forum for the second time.
sentences.chinese: 今年是天津市第二次作爲承辦城市。

sentences.english: I carefully prepared a second model class, finally got the recognition.
sentences.chinese: 但我精心準備了第二次示範課，這次終於得到了表揚。

sentences.english: How to dance can Hyun second marriage?
sentences.chinese: 如題。炫舞怎麼樣纔可以第二次結婚？

definition: for the first time/first (meeting, attempt etc)
repeatedly/over and over/to upend/unstable/to come and go/(of an illness) to return
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
